Module it.polimi.ingsw
Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.socket

Class SocketServer

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.socket.SocketServer
All Implemented Interfaces:
IServer
public class SocketServer
extends java.lang.Object
implements IServer
A socket implementation of IServer Players will connect to the server by instancing a TCP connection The server can receive and send packets simultaneously to multiple clients Connections are managed by worker threads provided by an ExecutorService Each thread will only be used when effectively needed and will never busy-wait

  • Field Summary

  • Constructor Details

    • SocketServer

      public SocketServer​(java.util.concurrent.ExecutorService executorService, int port) throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException, java.io.IOException
      Class constructor, submits tasks to the executor service
      Parameters:
      executorService - The executor service
      port - The port which the server will be bound to
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the port is not valid
      java.io.IOException - if there's an error while setting up the server
